mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Randolph, Richard
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Asks permission to send him model of new bridle for cavalry horses; wishes to procure a commission in the army; life of a soldier desirable only in time of war; hears there is a force being raised which will be called from home only in case on war; wishes commission.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1809 January 10, Varina, [Virginia] to [Thomas Jefferson], n.p.
